1.title: Inspiration: Mars
1.plot: Ryan MacDonald has a dream. He wants to be one of the chosen few to journey to Mars as part of the Mars One program, and be part of a colony that will live there. There's just one catch: it's a one way trip. Ryan can never return.

2.title: Inspiration: Architecture
2.plot: Tonkin-Liu are an innovative architecture firm based in London. We talk to Mike Tonkin and Anna Liu about their architectural inspirations, why architecture matters, and their ground breaking work with Shell Lace structure.

3.title: Inspiration: Sport
3.plot: Martin Rees is a running phenomena. A retired Welsh steel worker, he holds 54 world records between the distances of 5k and half marathon. This documentary looks at his incredible career, and how age is simply a state of mind.

imdb.plot outline: The mission to mars. Innovative architecture. Cutting edge fashion. Empowering sporting achievement. These are all stories we will share in our forthcoming documentary series 'Inspiration'. Season 1 celebrates remarkable characters and how their inspirations have shaped their own careers.
